articles.content: • ClearMask – the first US Food and Drug Administration-approved transparent surgical face mask, according to the company – has sold over 12.5 million see-through masks since April.

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Intel NUC M15 Laptop powered by its 11th gen processors announced - The Indian Express
articles.description: Intel has announced its NUC M15 Laptop Kit (originally code-named 'Bishop County'), which will be a new addition to the whitebook market. The laptop is powered by 11th gen processors.
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | New Delhi | 
Updated: November 21, 2020 6:03:23 pm
